title: Rolling an odd number
text: There are $$3$$ separate ways to roll an odd number. Either you roll a $$1$$, $$3$$, or $$5$$.

title: Total possible outcomes
text: There are a total of $$6$$ possible outcomes when rolling a 6-sided cube. Either you roll a $$1$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, $$4$$, $$5$$ or $$6$$.

title: Divide
text: Divide the number of outcomes for rolling an odd number by the total number of outcomes for your answer
